attributes.action: Close schools for the rest of the school year and cancel exams
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to close schools because lives are more important than education, there is only 7 or less months left until exams start and students are not going to be ready for exams since they lost so many months of education already so instead of carrying on with exams close schools and save lives instead of ignoring the calls for schools to be closed and you need a better education secretary, gavin williamson clearly doesn’t know what he is doing.
attributes.background: I want the government to close schools and to sack gavin williamson he clearly doesn’t know what he is doing

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments. That includes calling for a Minister to be removed from their job.

Since you started your petition, the Government has announced school closures and the cancellation of some exams.
